text: Travis Scott has'stepped up'for Kylie Jenner since the arrival of baby Stormi. The Butterfly Effect rapper, 26, and the Keeping Up With The Kardashians'star, 20, have been stronger than ever since the arrival of their daughter 12 weeks ago.'Kylie and Travis are doing well. They are a great family. Kylie is very in love with Travis. He is an amazing dad and loves spending time with their daughter. He has very much stepped up,'a source told People magazine. Proud papa : Travis Scott has'stepped up'for Kylie Jenner since the arrival of baby Stormi ; ( pictured April ) The insider added Travis hasn't been working as much, and is now'focused on spending time with Kylie and Stormi,'the insider added.
